home_item1_hoverText: European Leadership Position: Ranked top on professional platforms, GRG Group is the central player for sourcing and industrialization in Europe (France, Spain, Italy, Germany, Benelux).
home_item2_hoverText: Operational Excellence: We combine scientific engineering and industrial strength to transform your concepts into IFS-certified finished products.
home_item3_hoverText: Innovation & Scalability: We support brands in their growth with technical rigor and flexibility, ensuring quick access to international markets.
home_item4_hoverText: Fill Your Creativity: The unique alliance between aromatic creativity and high-precision production standards meeting global requirements.
home_item5_hoverText: Strategic Project Management: A single interface and externalized technical office to transform industrial complexity into a smooth process.
products_item1_hoverText: International supplier of BPANI aluminum cans (empty). Low MOQ possible through our group purchases to optimize your production costs (25cl, 33cl, 50cl).
products_item2_hoverText: Our flagship since 2007. Complete mastery of glass, RPET and BPANI cans with flexible MOQs to secure your innovative launches.
products_item3_hoverText: Production engineering for capsules and powders. Combination of advanced scientific formulation and premium active ingredient sourcing for your batches from 300 kg.
products_item4_hoverText: The future of food supplements: Flavorful gummies with patented active ingredients. Custom solution development from 5,000 units.
products_item5_hoverText: The nomadic and ecological alternative. Access over 36 proprietary recipes available immediately for rapid international deployment.
services_item1_hoverText: High Precision Packaging: BPANI can filling, PET/RPET or glass bottles. Single-dose sachets, doypack and pilbox.
services_item2_hoverText: Formulation Engineering: Recipe creation according to your objectives (Energy, Sports, Sleep). Ingredient mapping, samples and technical sheets.
services_item3_hoverText: International Standards: Excellence guaranteed by IFS Food, HACCP, DPG and Halal certifications for total food safety.
services_item4_hoverText: 23 Production Lines: Robust infrastructure located in Europe for ultra-responsive logistics. Possible extensions in US and Asian markets.
services_item5_hoverText: From idea to finished product: our teams support compliance, graphic creation and visual identity of your brand.
about_item1_hoverText: Strategic partner since 2007, GRG Group is an integrated solutions hub for food industry leaders.
about_item2_hoverText: Mass Production Capacity: Beverages Division (16 lines) and Nutraceuticals Division (7 lines). 3 integrated R&D laboratories to secure your flows.
about_item3_hoverText: Turnkey White Labels: Access to a catalog of proven formulas for accelerated Time-to-Market internationally.
about_item4_hoverText: Packaging & Design: Custom creative solutions with possibility of total delegation of packaging design phase.
about_item5_hoverText: A to Z Support: GRG Group combines the flexibility of a human-sized partner with the strength of a European industrial network.
contact_item1_hoverText: Professional Network: Follow the group's industrial news and our latest innovations on our official page.
contact_item2_hoverText: B2B Hub: Contact us 24/7 on the Europages platform for your sourcing and production project studies.
contact_item3_hoverText: Centralized Management: We coordinate R&D, production audits, packaging design and logistics security for you.
contact_item4_hoverText: Technical feasibility analysis: Ready to transform your concept into success? Contact our experts to book your slots. Email: hub@grg-groupe.com
